description:

title: Semicon India 2024: PM Modi Pulls Out All the Stops for Local Chip Growth

description:
The journey from today’s vehicles with modest ADAS features and limited autonomy to the longer-term goal of the uncrashable car must overcome considerable technical and commercial challenges.

The post How ADAS Sensing Is Evolving to Deliver Safer Vehicle Automation appeared first on EE Times.
title: How ADAS Sensing Is Evolving to Deliver Safer Vehicle Automation

description:
Introduction  Powering field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs) represents a challenge for power engineers due to their increasing number of logic cells, which increases complexity. In addition, these semiconductor devices are highly configurable, allowing designers to define the clock and phase-locked loop (PLL) frequencies, as well as configure the logic elements within them. Furthermore, defining the power […]

The post Developing a Smart FPGA Power Solution with MPS Modules appeared first on EE Times.
title: Developing a Smart FPGA Power Solution with MPS Modules
